Warranty & Support

If you’d like a copy of the manufacturer’s warranty for a product found on Amazon.com, you can contact the manufacturer directly or visit their website for more information. Price: $119.99 - $83.99
(as of Nov 29,2022 00:42:59 UTC – Details)


Enjoy the clarity and reliability of a landline phone, with easy-to-use features that make your work and home life easier. Panasonic Cordless Phone KX-TGD664M is a 4-handset home phone system expandable up to 6 handsets, with an integrated Digital Answering machine to make sure you never miss a message. Make even your cell calls more clear by using Link2Cell to connect your mobile phone to your landline, giving landline-level call clarity to every cell call that comes through. And no need to worry about draining the battery — an audible Low Battery Alert lets you know when the battery needs charging, and more. Noise Reduction Technology helps make every call as clear as possible by reducing the surrounding noise coming from the other party’s telephone. A robust Call Block system allows 1-step blocking up to 150 nuisance callers with the touch of a button, while a Phone book of up to 3,000 numbers makes sure all your important contacts easily accessible. A range of hands-free phone functions lets you enjoy mobility and flexibility–full duplex speakerphone lets you use your handset hands-free; handset can be used as a baby monitor even while away from home. Bilingual Caller ID lets you customize your caller ID to display in English or Spanish and get caller announcements in that same language so you can hear who is calling, even when you’re across the room (note: caller ID requires additional service through your local phone company).
Cordless Telephone with Digital Answering Machine: Phone system (expandable up to 6 handsets) stores up to 18 minutes of messages; Quick-read Message Counter lets you check for messages easily; retrieve from base unit or a from a handset
Connect to your Mobile Phone: Make and receive clear cell phone calls even in cell dead zones; Pair up to 2 cell phones via Bluetooth with the base unit for increased call clarity and reliability
Easily Block Unwanted Callers: Block up to 150 nuisance callers using the one-touch Call Block button
Hear More Clearly: Noise Reduction lets you hear the voice of the person you are talking to more clearly by reducing the surrounding noise coming from the other party’s telephone
Voice Functions and Baby Monitor: Full duplex speakerphone lets you use your handset hands-free and use voice commands; handset can easily monitor different areas of the house (such as a baby’s room) even while away from home

Panasonic KX-TGD664M

4 Handset Cordless Phone System with Link2Cell

Make working from home easier and stress-free with the smart, easy-to-use KX-TGD664M cordless phone system. Connect to a cell phone via Bluetooth for landline-level clarity on mobile calls. Robust,1-step Call Block helps you avoid nuisance callers, and many other features provide daily convenience.

Link2Cell Technology

Make and receive cellphone calls

Pair up to 2 cell phones via Bluetooth with the base unit to get increased call clarity and reliability, avoiding cell dead zones in your home. The handsets alert you when your cell phone receives incoming calls and texts and allow you to make and receive mobile phone calls with landline clarity.

Bilingual Taking Caller ID

Caller ID displays in English or Spanish and announces caller information in the language you choose, so you never miss an important call.

Easily Block Unwanted Callers

Say good-bye to scam calls and telemarketers. A one-touch Call Block button lets you easily block nuisance callers. Store up to 150 unwanted caller numbers.

Expand Your System

Keep additional handsets virtually anywhere you need in your home, expanding your phone system up to 6 cordless handsets (sold separately).

Digital Answering System

Records up to 18 minutes of messages, available at a glance from Quick-read Message Counter. Pick up messages from the base unit or cordless handset.

Noise-Free Talking & Listening

Noise reduction technology lets you hear the voice of the person you are talking to more clearly.

Store Important Numbers

Phonebook stores up to 3,000 important numbers. Caller ID displays up to 50 entries.

Speakerphone Doubles as a Baby Monitor

Place a cordless handset unit in baby's room to audibly monitor from different areas of the house or even while away from home! The monitored handset will automatically call the monitoring handset, base unit, or the stored phone number when it detects sound.

Long Battery Life with Low Battery Alert

Enjoy up to 10 hours talk time and 5 days of standby on handsets (while in eco mode). And, you never have to worry about the handset running out of power - audible alerts and visual icons make sure you know when it's time to charge.
